廣傳! 舉報藍絲小粉紅間諜活動: 入藉係當地宣誓，但公然效忠其他國家屬叛國罪, 移民局照踢走。

英國間碟MI5: https://www.gov.uk/report-suspicious-activity-to-mi5
英國移民局:https://www.amsallegations.homeoffice.gov.uk/default.aspx/RenderForm/?F.Name=Lf62UB7cz4C

美國間碟FBI: https://www.fbi.gov/tips
美國移民局: https://www.uscis.gov/report-fraud

澳洲間碟ASIS: https://www.asio.gov.au/counter-espionage.html
澳洲移民局: https://www.homeaffairs.gov.au/help-and-support/departmental-forms/online-forms/border-watch

加拿大間碟CSIS: https://www.canada.ca/en/security-intelligence-service/corporate/reporting-national-security-information.html
加拿大移民局: https://www.canada.ca/en/immigration-refugees-citizenship/services/protect-fraud/report-fraud.html

紐西蘭NZSIS: https://www.nzsis.govt.nz
紐西蘭移民局: https://www.immigration.govt.nz/about-us/policy-and-law/integrity-of-the-immigration-system/immigration-fraud
